actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-647, by Mr. Beilenson.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 5355 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. All points of order against consideration of the bill for failure to comply with the provisions of clause 2(l)(6) of rule XI and for failure to comply with the provisions of clause 5(a) of rule XXI shall be waived. Measure will be considered read. A specified amendment is in order. It shall be in order to consider an amendment printed in the House report accompanying this rule, to be debatable for one hour and not subject to amendment or points of order for failure to comply with the provisions of clause 7 of rule XVI
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 138.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 274 - 148 (Roll no. 284).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5355) to increase the statutory limit on the public debt.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5355 (public debt limit).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5355) to increase the statutory limit on the public debt.
